name: MYZEAL I.T. Solutions LLC
description:
Established in 2010, MYZEAL I.T. Solutions LLC is a leading California-based IT consulting delivering cutting-edge IT solutions to industries across verticals.  We work with startups, SMEs and enterprises worldwide to rapidly evolve ideas to products. Some of the key areas we focus on are: Custom Software Development, Mobile Apps, Cloud, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Blockchain and Internet of Things (IoT). 
 
We are a mix of 150+ creative strategists, developers, designers, HR professionals, and relationship managers with deep expertise in the IT domain. As a full-service technology partner, we’ve enabled more than 500 companies to realize their tech ideas and stay ahead of the competition.  With a world-class Offshore Development Center (ODC) in India and local project management teams in Southern California, US, we bring the best of both worlds to our clients. 
 
Major Offerings:
Custom Software Development
Web Application Development
Mobile App Design & Development
AI & Blockchain Development 
Cloud Deployment & Maintenance
Enterprise Content Management Solution
Quality Assurance & Testing
Staff Augmentation / Offshore Dedicated Team
READ MORE...
